name: The Hunt (itch) (falkkairies)
description:
The Hunt is a very small project created for my Y3 Experiential Design Assessment at the Southampton Solent University. 

Have fun, get terrified, and if you want to provide further feedback you can fill out the survey here:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfwvu8YqPIYfnzOmNx8dYUaT7Sn8ypWQ3zytnLl...

(Keep in mind that this is my first game ever created, so the quality of this product might not represent the standard of the SSU)
